Revised Julian calendar - The Revised Julian calendar, also known as the Rectified Julian calendar, or, less formally, New calendar, is a calendar, originated in 1923, which effectively discontinued the 340 y...
Revised Penal Code of the Philippines - The Revised Penal Code contains the general penal laws of the Philippines.
Revised New General Catalogue, an astronomy catalog
Revised Edition (Magic: The Gathering) - The Revised Edition of Magic: The Gathering (also simply known as Revised) was the fifth set and third core set released for the game.
revise definition: an act of revising.
Revised Version and New Revised Standard Version of the King James Bible
Revisable-Form Text - Revisable-Form Text (abbreviated RFT or RFT-DCA) is part of IBM's Document Content Architecture (DCA).
Revised Statutes of the United States - The Revised Statutes of the United States was the first official codification of the Acts of Congress.
